name: Ye Grand Ol' Time
description:
3D Side Scroller game with three playable characters. Use the time amulet to bypass obstacles while fighting your way to defeat the evil warrior at his castle.


Controls:
Move - A,D / Left Joystick
Jump - Space / A/Cross Buttons
Attack - Left Mouse Button / X/Sqaure Buttons
Time Travel - Right Mouse Button / Y/Triangle Buttons
Pause - P, Escape / Start/Menu Buttons
